ingredients: 4 leeks – 4” of tops and roots trimmed (1 1/2 lbs) (680gr), cut in half lengthwise, thoroughly washed and cut in 1/4” slices
4 large garlic cloves – skinned and finely chopped
1/4 teaspoon dried red chili pepper flakes
freshly ground black pepper to taste
freshly ground nutmeg to taste (use microplane grater)
freshly ground black pepper to taste
8 oz (227gr) Wisconsin Asiago – coarsely grated (2 cups)
1 tablespoon sea salt (for the pasta water)
1 medium (15″ x 10″) ceramic or glass baking dish – buttered
